statements: SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_id ASC
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, user_id FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 101
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_date, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_date HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM user_transactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(reward_amount) AS total_reward FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_reward > 100;
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_transaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5
SELECT user_id, SUM(reward_amount) AS total_rewards FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_rewards DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(reward_amount) AS avg_reward, MAX(reward_amount) AS max_reward FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_reward > 500
SELECT * FROM loyalty_users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM loyalty_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM loyalty_rewards WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY reward_points ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM loyalty_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_id FROM loyalty_users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM loyalty_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, reward_name, reward_points FROM loyalty_users INNER JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_users.user_id = loyalty_rewards.reward_id;

SELECT DISTINCT user_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_users INNER JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_users.user_id = loyalty_rewards.reward_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_points > 500;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(reward_amount) AS total_rewards FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.amount, r.reward_amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN rewards r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, loyalty_points FROM users WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT reward_description, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC

SELECT users.username, transactions.transaction_amount, rewards.reward_description FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id JOIN user_rewards ON users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE user_rewards.redeemed = TRUE
SELECT users.username, SUM(transactions.transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY total_spent DESC

SELECT users.username, rewards.reward_description, rewards.reward_points FROM users JOIN user_rewards ON users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE rewards.reward_points > 5
